amendment.description: Amendment freezes the formula in title I as of the date of enactment concerning off-shore drilling; requires states to address environmental concerns in their plans and that those plans comply with state and federal law; and establishes a competitive grant program to help states provide recreational opportunities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 106-612 to eliminate the perception that the bill includes incentives for new oil and gas drilling; define the already existing program requirement within the bill; and to create a program for administration of certain projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
